comment.author: 31085383@N03
comment._content:
I'm trying to work out the direction this photo is placed. 

Is this King St facing west looking down from Elizabeth St? Is the dome on the left mid street the old Grace Bros dome? Or is this a photo of George St looking south from King St? That would make the dome The Queen Victoria building, wouldn't it?

Also would love to know vintage of photo.

comment.author: 32536320@N05
comment._content: Interesting photograph, there seems to be lot of men gathered in the one spot in this photo, I wonder why?

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: See reverse view photo and information: www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2376884304/

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: The crowd may be because the Daily Telegraph office was in King Street on the left; people used to gather nearby to learn the latest news. See also - www.flickr.com/photos/statelibraryofnsw/2964804829/
